name: Emerge Tools
headline: Supercharge your mobile apps
description:
Emerge is a suite of developer tools designed to supercharge mobile apps and the teams that build them.

Our tooling is already used by many of the best mobile teams in the world like DoorDash, Square, Airbnb, Duolingo, Stripe, among others. Come help us make it even better!

## Discover the unknown
Go in depth with all Emerge Tools has to offer

![Background meteors](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbackground-meteors.ed3616d7.png&w=3840&q=75&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)

### Size Analysis
#### Monitor & reduce app size
[Read docs](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/docs.emergetools.com/docs/what-is-app-size>)[Explore more](https://www.emergetools.com/</explore>)[Live demo](https://www.emergetools.com/</app/example/ios/wikipedia>)
Get alerted about size changes on pull requests
Prevent unwanted changes with size thresholds
Actionable insights to reduce size
Automated analysis provides instant results
Track app size over time
Dashboards help keep you & your team on top of size
Understand your app like never before
Visualize the size of code, assets, & localizations
Compare against competitors
Use AI to see how your app stacks up to the competition
![Get alerted about size changes on pull requests](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F1.d448ff83.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Actionable insights to reduce size](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F2.ad5c693f.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Track app size over time](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F3.3440cec6.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Understand your app like never before](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F4.b59d1760.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Compare against competitors](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F5.3e76b2fb.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)

#### Build UIs with confidence
[Read docs](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/docs.emergetools.com/docs/snapshot-testing>)[Quick explainer](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=JbPJRq1ZXm0&ab_channel=EmergeTools>)[Read a case study](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/joinhandshake.com/blog/our-team/effortless-ios-snapshot-testing-using-emerge-tools/>)
Stop visual regressions in their tracks
See how your UI changes directly on your pull request
The best tests are the ones you donâ€™t have to write
We take advantage of SwiftUI & Jetpack Compose to automatically generate previews
Automatic storage
Say ðŸ‘‹ to painful git management for snapshot images
Web platform for easy snapshot diff examination
Search, filter, sort by the snapshots with the biggest diff %
Visualize the history of every component
See how each component has changed over time

### Reaper
#### Automatically kill dead code
[Read docs](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/docs.emergetools.com/docs/reaper>)[Read a case study](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/blog.duolingo.com/emerge-tools-reaper/>)[How it works](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/www.emergetools.com/blog/posts/dead-code-detection-with-reaper>)
Dynamic runtime analysis
Find dead code based on production usage
Bye, bye forgotten feature flags
Clean up existing technical debt using Reaper
Less is more
Deleting unused code has powerful downstream technical impacts from fewer bugs to improved startup time
![Dynamic runtime analysis](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F1.9d9e7c1f.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Bye, bye forgotten feature flags](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F2.b13b31b0.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Less is more](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F3.4ed9a321.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)

![Performance Analysis](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fhomepage%2Fhero%2Fperformance-analysis.png&w=3840&q=100&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)
### Performance Analysis
#### Diagnose & prevent performance regressions
[Read docs](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/docs.emergetools.com/docs/performance-testing>)[Watch a debugging session](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=q0iSLAxzKqE>)[Read a case study](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/careersatdoordash.com/blog/how-we-reduced-our-ios-app-launch-time-by-60/>)
Continuously monitor app startup time
On every nightly or every pull request
Speedy, accurate performance testing on real devices
Minimize flakiness with our private device farm & analysis
Visualize performance changes
Easy to understand tooling to help diagnose & fix issues
Track performance of UI tests
Support for XCUI & UI Automator tests
Automated insights to help identify bad patterns
Find instant ways to reduce app startup time 
![Continuously monitor app startup time](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F1.c6c2968a.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Speedy, accurate performance testing on real devices](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F2.2494b21e.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Visualize performance changes](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F3.71c54623.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Track performance of UI tests](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F4.d219fd79.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Automated insights to help identify bad patterns](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F5.d1d3e75d.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)

### Launch Booster
#### Improve app startup time
[Read docs](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/docs.emergetools.com/docs/launch-booster-ios>)[How it works](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/www.emergetools.com/blog/posts/FasterAppStartupOrderFiles>)
Reduce app startup time instantly
Utilize order files to make your appâ€™s launch up to 20% faster
Easy integration
Add a step into your release process and see immediate results in production
![Reduce app startup time instantly](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F1.0f165297.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Easy integration](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F2.a77ecd3c.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)

### Build Distribution
#### Share builds with your team
[Read iOS docs](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/docs.emergetools.com/docs/ios-build-distribution>)[Read Android docs](https://www.emergetools.com/<https:/docs.emergetools.com/docs/android-build-distribution>)
Effortless installation
Install builds via QR code, direct link, or our web UI
Cross-platform, easy auth
Distribute iOS and Android builds to your team with just a few clicks
Integrated with your workflow
Automatically distribute builds from your existing CI/CD/Emerge pipeline
Keep users up to date
Our SDKs automatically prompts your users to stay up to date with the latest builds
![Effortless installation](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F1.92f36d06.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Cross-platform, easy auth](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F2.e2e87b87.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Integrated with your workflow](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F3.bf3579a3.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)![Keep users up to date](https://www.emergetools.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F4.d2a177e3.png&w=3840&q=95&dpl=dpl_55Na9aeiSYCKFYphGVAohQKY7t2K)

generated_description:
**Emerge Tools: Supercharging Mobile App Development**

Founded in 2020 and based in Santa Monica, CA, Emerge Tools is a thriving company that specializes in developer tools aimed at enhancing mobile app performance. With a mission to "supercharge your mobile apps," Emerge allows development teams to optimize their processes and outputs, making it a popular choice among leading companies like DoorDash, Square, Airbnb, Duolingo, and Stripe.

The company emerged from the Y Combinator Batch W21 and boasts a compact team of nine dedicated employees, led by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer. Emerge Tools operates within the domains of artificial intelligence, developer tools, B2B, and enterprise solutions.

### Key Products and Features:

1. **Size Analysis**: This tool helps developers monitor and reduce app sizes, providing alerts about size changes and actionable insights to better manage app weight.
   
2. **Snapshots**: A solution for UI testing that allows developers to track visual regressions effortlessly and compare changes directly on pull requests. This ensures UIs are built with confidence and accuracy.

3. **Reaper**: Emerge Toolsâ€™ code analysis feature that dynamically identifies and eliminates dead code, improving overall performance and maintainability.

4. **Performance Analysis**: Focuses on diagnosing and preventing performance regressions, including continuous monitoring of app startup times and offering automated insights to optimize performance.

5. **Launch Booster**: Optimizes app startup time using order files, making launches up to 20% faster with minimal setup required.

6. **Build Distribution**: Streamlines the process of sharing builds across teams, integrating effortlessly with existing CI/CD pipelines and fostering cross-platform compatibility.

Emerge Tools emphasizes collaboration and efficiency by offering tools that integrate tightly into development workflows. Their products cater to both iOS and Android, ensuring that development teams can work across platforms without the hassle of separate environments.

For anyone looking to enhance their mobile development efforts, Emerge Tools presents a compelling solution. Their product suite is not just robust; itâ€™s backed by industry leaders and designed with the challenges of modern mobile apps in mind.

If youâ€™re excited about improving your app development process and want to join a team thatâ€™s transforming the mobile landscape, check out their offerings at [Emerge Tools](https://www.emergetools.com/) and get started today!
